entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
